text: Ryan Nugent-Hopkins (born April 12, 1993 in Burnaby, British Columbia) is a Canadian professional ice hockey centre. He currently plays for the Edmonton Oilers of the National Hockey League (NHL). He was selected by the Edmonton Oilers with the 1st overall pick in the 2011 NHL Entry Draft. == Sources == * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian ice hockey centres Category:Edmonton Oilers players Category:Ice hockey people from British Columbia Category:Oklahoma City Barons players Category:People from Burnaby
title: Ryan Nugent-Hopkins
